# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Returns the Virtio console port at the specified index.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(portIndex: Int) -> VZVirtioConsolePort? { get }
```

## Parameters

- **portIndex**: The index of the port to return, if present.

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioConsolePort] port, or `nil` if the index is outside the bounds of the array.
